page.title: 05FARMING - NORTH TAWTON
page.content: The most popular type of farming in this area is arable,dairy & grass.The Average size of each farm is{200 {acres.}This area is mainly good arable land (which is class 2 red soil of excellent quality). There are about {4-5}farmers who grow mainly Barley,there are 11 beef farmers A lot of swedes are grown for human consumption. Farmers normally sell their swedes to London markets. the swedes normally grown are {"DEVON {CHAMPION".}There are a few mangold farmers.Most of the farmers make silage & hay. There isn't any derelict land in this area. The Barley mainly grown is Sonja and Igri. The wheat that is grown is Huntsman and Rapier. The oats (Penny arth) are grown on a very small acreage in this area.
